name: Tracking Protection in Firefox
body:
[Monica Chew](http://monica-at-mozilla.blogspot.com/) (@monicachew) and [Georgios Kontaxis](https://www.cs.columbia.edu/~kontaxis/) (@kontaxis) along with a bunch of awesome Mozillians worked on bringing built-in tracking protection to Firefox. This page summarizes their efforts and organizes external resources from the original bugzilla bugs to open-source tools that were created in the process as well as measurements, presentations and blog posts.

### News
* 3/5/2015: Our paper on implementing tracking protection in Firefox will appear at the [2015 Web 2.0 Security & Privacy (W2SP) workshop](http://ieee-security.org/TC/SPW2015/W2SP/).
